In England, in the seven days to 15 July, there were 266,515 new confirmed cases (473.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 July, there were 186,114 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 43% (80,401 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 20 July is 4,812,460 (8,549.9 cases per 100,000 population).
